sentence.Network_en: The market traders cried out like barnyard cocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 市场商贩就像农家场院的公鸡一样大声吆喝.

sentence.Network_en: The turkey struts about ( the barnyard ).
sentence.Network_cn: 火鸡翘起尾羽 ( 在谷仓附近 ) 走来走去.

sentence.Network_en: He walked up to the barnyard in a royal way.
sentence.Network_cn: 昂首阔步地走到谷仓空地那里.

entry.tran: 场院（谷仓前面或旁边的场地）
entry.def: On a farm, the barnyard is the area in front of or next to a barn.
